column1: Little Goat Diner////While the servers were fantastic
column3: the food was so unimpressive that I can only give this one star. The Los Drowned that I'd heard so much about was not really worth the calories. I split it with someone and didn't bother to finish it. The rest of the food was just ok
column4: nothing special or exciting. I'd go back for a drink at the bar
column5: but that's about it. Not impressed.
